content.body: I can't make the meeting today (i'll be on the tube from Richmond to London)
I hope you all know it is technically illegal to visit London and not stop by the Bloomberg building to say hi. Please remember this for next time.

> <@robpalme:matrix.org> I hope you all know it is technically illegal to visit London and not stop by the Bloomberg building to say hi. Please remember this for next time. 

Ugh i tried to fit it in :( i shall be sure to do next time
